resourceTemplates.name: my-recent-signins
resourceTemplates.title: My recent sign-ins since date
resourceTemplates.description: Lists the current user's sign-ins since a given UTC timestamp. Provide {userId} and {since} (e.g., 2025-08-01T00:00:00Z).

resourceTemplates.name: my-risk-detections
resourceTemplates.title: My risk detections since date
resourceTemplates.description: Shows identity protection risk detections for the current user since a given UTC timestamp.

resourceTemplates.name: my-risky-user-status
resourceTemplates.title: My risky user status
resourceTemplates.description: Gets the riskyUsers record for the current user (if any). Provide {userId} as the AAD object id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-mfa-registration-summary
resourceTemplates.title: My MFA/SSPR registration summary
resourceTemplates.description: Fetches the authentication methods registration summary for the current user via the reports endpoint.

resourceTemplates.name: my-auth-method-details
resourceTemplates.title: My authentication method details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets details for a specific authentication method by id from the user's registered methods.

resourceTemplates.name: my-signin-preferences
resourceTemplates.title: My sign-in preferences
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the current user's sign-in preferences (authentication strengths, FIDO restrictions, etc.).

resourceTemplates.name: my-managed-device-details
resourceTemplates.title: My managed device details by id
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves rich details for one of the current user's managed devices by id.

resourceTemplates.name: my-device-configuration-states
resourceTemplates.title: My device configuration states
resourceTemplates.description: Lists configuration state results for a specific managed device owned by the current user.

resourceTemplates.name: my-device-compliance-states
resourceTemplates.title: My device compliance policy states
resourceTemplates.description: Lists compliance policy state results for a specific managed device owned by the current user.

resourceTemplates.name: my-owned-devices
resourceTemplates.title: My owned devices
resourceTemplates.description: Lists devices owned by the current user from directory perspective (can differ from managed devices).

resourceTemplates.name: my-directory-audit-events
resourceTemplates.title: My directory audit events since date
resourceTemplates.description: Shows directory audit events initiated by the current user from a given UTC timestamp onward.

resourceTemplates.name: my-oauth-consent-grants
resourceTemplates.title: My app consent grants
resourceTemplates.description: Lists OAuth2 permission grants (app consents) where the current user is the principal.
